system.weapons:
1 Radcannon (Front, Range 150m (2 AU), S/-/-, 3d10+10 E, Pen 10, Clip 100, Reload 2 Full, Unreliable)

2 Flechette Cannons (Front/Left/Rear or Front/Right/Rear, Range 300m (3 AU), S/4/-, 3d10+10 R, Pen 3, Clip 500, Reload 2 Full) +10 to hit vehicles, dealing 3d10+20 damage at short range.
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. Pilot can make +0 Pilot (Space Craft) Test to affix to a Spacecraft, taking 5 Full Rounds to drill through. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up. Can be launched as either Assault Craft or Fighter, has Craft Rating of +8 (Assault Craft) or +4 (Fighter) and squadron size of 15 for Attack Craft Purposes.
